mapper.select: select l.id as id , l.title as title, l.dscp as dscp , l.userid as userid , l.categoryname as categoryname, l.rtmpurl as rtmpurl, l.status as status, l.seriescode as seriescode , u.username as username from liveroom l left join user u on l.userid=u.id where title like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or l.dscp like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or l.categoryname like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
